statements: DELETE FROM Inventory WHERE supplier_id = 500 AND product_category = 'Electronics';
DELETE FROM Inventory WHERE product_id = 100 AND current_stock < reorder_point
DELETE FROM inventory WHERE current_stock < reorder_point AND replenishment_schedule = 'monthly';
DELETE FROM Sales WHERE product_id = 2002 AND sale_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM products WHERE stock_level <= 10 AND price > 100.00;
DELETE FROM inventory WHERE id = 101 AND quantity <= 10;
DELETE FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id IN (SELECT supplier_id FROM products WHERE stock_level = 0);
